title: Oscar Recap, Rick Ross Hospitalized, Barack Obama's Basketball Team Pick and more
itunes:title: Oscar Recap, Rick Ross Hospitalized, Barack Obama's Basketball Team Pick and more
description:
The Steve Harvey Morning Show discusses the 90th Academy Awards, Rick Ross Hospitalization, President Obama's Basketball Team Pick, What Black People say at the movies, and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
